newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Yield eases on Portuguese 91-day bills.
newsitem.headline: Yield eases on Portuguese 91-day bills.

text.p: The average yield eased to 6.715 percent, from 6.7336 percent previously, at the Treasury's sale of 20 billion escudos of 91-day bills, the Bank of Portugal said.
The last such sale was on November 6.
